TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中已选中项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个存储中的选中的项控件。A stores the checked items in a control. 如果，则可以只选中项的属性控件设置为`true`。Items can only be checked if the property of the control is set to `true`. 项目存储在项包含在。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 类存储中显示的所有项目控件。The class stores all items displayed in the control. 下表显示了如何的示例中存储的项以及其所选内容状态的一个示例控件。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|项Item|检查在 ListView 中的状态Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选中状态Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已选中Checked| |22|Item3Item3|未选中状态Unchecked| |33|Item4Item4|已选中Checked| |44|Item5Item5|已选中Checked| 基于上表中的示例下, 表演示了如何将会显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|已签入 ListViewItemCollection 的项Checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|--------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Item4Item4| |22|Item5Item5| 可以使用的属性和此类的方法来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定的某个项是否类是的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项目已在集合中，可以使用方法，以确定中项的位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定中的选定项的数目控件。This property enables you to determine the number of checked items in the control. 遍历集合的值时，然后可以使用此值，需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的属性中的项的键相对应。The property of a corresponds to the key for an item in a . 密钥的比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果项的调用，最后一个索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，但如果没有匹配项，则搜索开始的集合的开始处返回。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.

exception.span: 所有者 处于虚拟模式下。

span.span: The owner is in virtual mode.
